messages.messageBody:
I actually did have one in shallow doo-doo just yesterday! that's what I
get for allowing nude toddlers to wander the house....amidst the rest of our
"creative projects" which seem to be EVERYWHERE.
Susan

Uh oh...Julian is in deep doo-doo (well, not literally...)

Kathryn
